verses.roman:
ataeva brahma-sūtrera bhāṣya-śrī-bhāgavata
bhāgavata-śloka, upaniṣat kahe 'eka' mata

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; brahma-sūtrera bhāṣya—the commentary on the Brahma-sūtra codes; śrī-bhāgavata—Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; bhāgavata-śloka—the verses in Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; upaniṣat—the explanations in the Upaniṣads; kahe—state; eka mata—the same version.
translation: "That which is explained in the verses of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam and in the Upaniṣads serves the same purpose.
